original_title: Griffen – Auf den Spuren von Peter Handke
overview: Bernd Liepold-Mosser returns home to a place bordering the bilingual region of Lower Carinthia to talk to the people there about their “great son” Peter Handke. His search unearths the many unresolved contradictions and ambivalences of a small place where there is repression of the Slovenian-speaking past.
title: Griffen – On the Tracks of Peter Handke
